item.title: Aspose.Slides for Java 22.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Java 22.12 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESJAVA-38304 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.12 features Enhancement SLIDESJAVA-38873 Footer content inconsistency in PPT document Bug https://docs.aspose.com/slides/java/presentation-header-and-footer/ SLIDESJAVA-38918 Kanji text is not displayed correctly when converting PPTX to PDF Bug https://docs.aspose.com/slides/java/convert-powerpoint-to-pdf/ SLIDESJAVA-38999 Getting the height of a table cell throws KeyNotFoundException Bug https://docs.
